features: Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks
Contoured applicator for comfortable, precise placement.
body.description: Product Description Your active life demands Sport Level Protection and Comfort from Playtex Sport. Every period, every day. 3 Levels to Protection and Comfort: 1 Unique, contoured applicator with No-Slip Grip design for comfortable insertion and precise placement to help prevent leaks. 2 Anti-Leak back up layer for defense against leaks. 3 Custom fit design that expands all around with every move you make for incredible comfort. Brand Story By Playtex From the Manufacturer Designed to give active women extra protection during exercise and other activities. View larger.Playtex Sport with FlexFit fibers Protection for Bodies in Motion 360° Sport Level Protection tampon design to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. FlexFit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. 2-layers of interlocking fibers to protect against leakages. Contoured applicator for comfortable, precise placementWhat's in the Box Playtex Sport Tampons, Unscented, Multipack (36 count).Playtex Sport Multipack TamponsPurse PakMultipack Unscented 36 ct.Multipack Scented 36 ct.Multipack Unscented (Light/Regular/Super) 36ct.Playtex Sport Body WipesSinglesTravel PackTampons are associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Please consult the product insert for further information. WARNING SIGNS OF TSS ARE, FOR EXAMPLE, SUDDEN FEVER (USUALLY 102° F OR MORE), VOMITING, DIARRHEA, FAINTING OR NEAR FAINTING WHEN STANDING UP, DIZZINESS, OR A RASH THAT LOOKS LIKE A SUNBURN. IF THESE SIGNS OR OTHER SIGNS OF TSS APPEAR, YOU SHOULD REMOVE THE TAMPON AT ONCE, DISCONTINUE USE, AND SEE YOUR DOCTOR IMMEDIATELY. IMPORTANT FACTS ABOUT TSS:There is risk of TSS to all women using tampons during their menstrual period. TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. There are scientific studies that have concluded that tampons contribute to the cause of TSS. The reported risks are higher to women under 30 years of age and teenage girls. The incidence of TSS is estimated to be between 1 and 17 cases of TSS per 100,000 menstruating women and girls per year. REDUCING YOUR RISK OF TSS:You can reduce the risk of developing TSS during your period by alternating tampons with feminine pads. You can avoid any possible risk of getting tampon-associated TSS by not using tampons. There are scientific studies which have concluded that higher absorbency tampons increase the risk of TSS. You should select the minimum absorbency needed to control your flow to reduce the risk of developing TSS. Tampons are available in a range of absorbencies: Regular Absorbency (6-9 grams), Super Absorbency (9-12 grams) and Super Plus Absorbency (12-15 grams). Each absorbency range represents the grams of fluid that can be absorbed by all manufacturers' tampons based on a standardized laboratory test. Use this information to compare the absorbency of these tampons to other brands. If you have had warning signs of TSS in the past, you should check with your doctor before using tampons again. Consult your doctor if you have any questions about tampon use and TSS. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Playtex are the best
reviews.reviewText: I"ve been using this brand for year, it's by far the best for me. I use U or S+ size for heavy days then switch to S/R.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2016
reviews.reviewText: These arrived in less than 24 hours after placing the order win free Prime shipping. The price is equatable to a good sale at the grocery store. This, combined with free shipping to my front door, is enough for me! I'm not going to go much into the actual product.... If you're a female of menstruating capacity, you just know what you like. But in case you haven't tried these, know they work well. The combination box accommodates various phases of the cycle and the overall design makes them easy to use. My one concern is that applicator, which is made of plastic, is not biodegradable. Hopefully they get recycled someone along the process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Nice to have a variety pack. I don't know that I'd say they're that much more effective at staying in place/leak protection than regular tampons, but they work fine. Just keep in mind that if you are ordering this on subsc & save, to WATCH OUT! Amzon is known to creep up the prices over time--once you are lulled into complacency from the convenience of it all--but did you know that you might get charged a price that is substantially higher than what it shows you on your subscriptions page? I happened upon this practice when I noticed that there was approximately a 25-33% premium being charged on some items in my S&S order. This was different from the price that Amzon said I was being charged when I was reviewing my order. It only showed the true price on the back-end. I could attach the screen shots, but due to the personal nature of the products, I'm electing not to. :) So, be very careful with your orders. Customer service basically replied saying they don't do post-purchase adjustments. They were not interested in fixing this issue for the consumer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Funny story. One time I was getting my wisdom teeth pulled out and had to go under anesthesia because my wisdom teeth hadn't come out all the way so they were surgically removed. When I woke up, I had these two strings coming out of my mouth. I said to the nurses, "Who put these tampons in my mouth?" They laughed.Anyway, I'm not sure if these were the same tampons they used, but if they were it worked great to stop the bleeding of my gums from getting my wisdom teeth taken out. If they're good enough for that, they should be good enough for menstrual bleeding in the va-jay-jay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing Slides in Better!
reviews.reviewText: Love Playtex- always have! Seriously, ladies, you need to purchase these on Amazon Subscribe and Save. I work at a grocery store and a box of 36 of regulars and supers goes for over $10+!! TEN bucks! That's insane. I get this box for half the price on Amazon and FREE shipping for Subscribe and Save. I get a box every month which has worked out perfectly because I always have at least two boxes worth at any given time. Not only that, but these are just the easiest, most comfortable tampons out there. My only complaint is that it's hard to find the scented kind. I love the scented because it makes my purse smell good. Shut up! I know I'm a weirdo! :P

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice to have two sizes in one box
reviews.reviewText: I love the playtex sport line, the applicator is great having a plug kind of shape places the tampon in perfect position for maximum comfort and protection. Excellent for young new users as well as older girls like myself. They don't leak even after long walks. Nice to have two sizes for heavy days and nights and lighter days in one box. The sport line is the best tampon out there, especially for us active gals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never buy another brand ever again. So comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried just about every brand out there and I find a lot of them are uncomfortable because of the way the expand or because they feel too long after wearing them for a while. I haven't had a problem with these yet! The applicator is comfortable and the packaging is easy to open and dispose of and I rarely if I'm using the correct size. Sometimes I just use what I have available... I would definitely recommend for petite women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 29, 2015

reviews.reviewText: My flow is quite heavy so I nearly bled through the super faster than I expected. It's slightly less absorbent I guess than other tampons I've used, but it is comfortable and feels like nothing.
Absorbency is great and one of the better products that prevent leakage
